title: Not sure where to submit art for RP, but I am 1 RP from affording an emote!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
This is a picture I drew of Jhin wearing me like a pair of pants, as he does in all of my wildest dreams. I hope all of you on the (very generous and giving) Riot team will accept this in exchange for 1 IP! Thank you!
 {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body:
The only responses I have for this beauty are these Jhin quotes.....

"Only perfectio - gah! ... only perfection is acceptable."
"It hurts so good..."
"I find your work very, very... obvious."
"I serve a discerning clientele."

No seriously though this is friggin amazing I love it xD!!!! Take your RP and get yoself an emote!!!!!!
Thank you so much!! I will spend it wisely! And I very much appreciate all of your Jhin quotes ;^P They are "Fabulous!"
